Package game.behaviours

Class LLMNPCDialogueBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.behaviours.LLMNPCDialogueBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour, LLMDialogueBehaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
GhostBehaviour, PoetBehaviour, SeerBehaviour
public abstract class LLMNPCDialogueBehaviour extends Object implements LLMDialogueBehaviour
An abstract class that provides a base implementation for NPC dialogue behaviours using a Large Language Model (LLM) to generate responses. It handles the interaction with the LLMMonologueManager and provides a method to interpret the raw response into an action.

    • LLMNPCDialogueBehaviour

      protected LLMNPCDialogueBehaviour(LLMMonologueManager manager, ActionHistoryProvider historyProvider, LLMNPC llmnpc)
      Constructor for LLMNPCDialogueBehaviour. Initializes the behaviour with a manager for LLM monologues, a history provider, and the NPC that will use this behaviour.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager for LLM monologues
      historyProvider - The provider for action history of the player
      llmnpc - The NPC that will use this behaviour

  • Method Details

    • interpretResponse

      public LLMDialogueAction interpretResponse(String raw, Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Interpret the raw response from the LLM and wrap it into an action. This method is called after the LLMMonologueManager has generated a response.

    • getAction

      public Action getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Constructs the prompt for the LLM based on the NPC's dialogue context. This method should be implemented by subclasses to provide specific prompts.
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      The constructed prompt string
